title: How Far Can Evenepoel Go on Tour de France Debut? ‘It’s Going to Be Tough to Beat Tadej, But We Have to Believe’
content:
Evenepoel faces 'moment of truth' in the Pyrénées after making bulldozing start to his Tour de France debut.

Read the full article at How Far Can Evenepoel Go on Tour de France Debut? ‘It’s Going to Be Tough to Beat Tadej, But We Have to Believe’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
